        public SSDPDiscoveryThread(int interval)
                    throws SocketException
        Sole constructor.
        Parameters:
        interval - The minimum interval (in seconds) between broadcast messages.
        Throws:
        SocketException - If the underlying DatagramSocket cannot be conditioned.
